Paragraph.Text: The Particle Compressor is used to compress the outputs of a maximum of 4 Particle Filters into a denser usable form. The output of the Particle Compressor is so dense that it resembles a liquid when outputted. The Particle Compressor is built in a 3x3x3 formation.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Manufacturing Time: Power Required: Power Capacity: Max. Power Recharge Rate: Gas Storage: Compressed Gas Storage: Gas Required:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: 5 seconds 512 per second 4096 10000 per second 750 5 232 per compressed
